divs: Sighting DetailsSaw this thing AGAIN tonight over top the same school again but on the other end!.it did the same thing,it appeared out of no where this time about 9:15pm and looked star-like but got really bright and was stationary for about 10 minutes.It slowly moved West,and i mean SLOWLY,and made its way past the front of my building.I looked at it through binoculars most of the time and it changed colors from half of it green and other half red when it was stationary.When it moved,it began to blink andthe lights on opposite ends would blink.1 red,1 green 2 white on the middle of each side would not blink-also yellow like.the craft looked rectangular or diamond like in shape,very drak in color.Very unusual craft.It obviously has good control over what it wants to appear to look like.My husband saw this also-he couldn't figure it out but he didn't see it with binoculars either-'cos i was so fixiated i wouldn't share.
Summary: Saw rectangular or diamond like shaped craft, sometimes blinking & stationary over top of school again tonight. Very strange.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in New Albany
There were 2 other sightings in New Albany on or around February 17th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
